snippet: The police said that Myls Dobson had been in the care of Kryzie King, a family friend he barely knew, who has been charged with assault and reckless endangerment.
abstract: New York City police say there were signs of abuse of 4-year-old Myls Dobson, but few warnings in days leading up to his death in Midtown Manhattan luxury apartment; toddler had been in care of family friend he barely knew, Kryzie King, who has been charged with assault and reckless endangerment; child's father, Okee Wade, had left child with King when he began serving jail term in New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: The police said that Myls Dobson had been in the care of Kryzie King, a family friend he barely knew, who has been charged with assault and reckless endangerment.

headline.main: Signs of Abuse in Toddler’s Death, but Few Warnings
headline.print_headline: Signs of Abuse in Toddler’s Death, but Few Warnings
